mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tradehistory (varietyCode, openClose, cmd, counts, price, createTime, poundage, status, newOpenOrderNum, version) values (#{varietyCode}, #{openClose}, #{cmd}, #{counts}, #{price}, #{createTime}, #{poundage}, #{status}, #{newOpenOrderNum}, unix_timestamp(now()))
